alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:19PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Webb County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1019 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Laredo Community College, or near Laredo, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Rio Bravo, Texas A&M, Laredo International Airport, Unitec Industrial Park, St Augustine High School South Laredo, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Laredo Country Club, Laredo Community College, Orvil and United South High School. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 15. US Highway 59 between mile markers 814 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 718 and 728. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
